channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiWeb
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- Fortinet FortiWeb

item.title: CVE-2019-16156|2024-08-05T01:10:41.039Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiweb
item.description: An Improper Neutralization of Input vulnerability in the Anomaly Detection Parameter Name in Fortinet FortiWeb 6.0.5, 6.2.0, and 6.1.1 may allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to perform a Cross Site Scripting attack (XSS).

item.title: CVE-2019-16157|2024-08-05T01:10:41.563Z -- fortinet -- fortinet%20fortiweb
item.description: An information exposure vulnerability in Fortinet FortiWeb 6.2.0 CLI and earlier may allow an authenticated user to view sensitive information being logged via diagnose debug commands.
